dashboard.load_docs_desc: The system will analyze your documents to understand the facts.
dashboard.opposing_docs_desc: Letters from the other side, their evidence
dashboard.no_docs_link: I don't have documents - I want to describe the case
dashboard.help_desc: Why is this important? AI needs to know the "hard data" before advising.
dashboard.help_my_docs: My Documents: Upload everything that supports your case (contracts, proofs of payment, sent letters).
dashboard.help_opposing_docs: Opposing Party Docs: Upload letters you received. This allows AI to assess risks.
dashboard.help_footer: We support PDF, images, and text files. If you don't have digital documents, you can skip this step ("I don't have documents") and describe the case in the next stage.
dashboard.input_placeholder: Type your answer to AI questions...
dashboard.interview_help_desc: Documents rarely say everything. In this step, the Assistant acts as an experienced lawyer and asks follow-up questions.
dashboard.interview_help_honest: Answer honestly: The Assistant is here to help, not judge. The more details you provide, the better the strategy.
dashboard.interview_help_dunno: Don't know? If you don't know the answer, just write "I don't know" or "I don't remember".
dashboard.interview_help_finish: Finish: When you think you've said everything, click the "Finish Interview" button in the top right.
dashboard.tile_docs_desc: Upload lawsuits, letters, and evidence. The AI will analyze their contents and detecting key facts. You can also describe the case without documents.
dashboard.tile_interview_desc: The AI will ask precise follow-up questions based on your documents. This is key to understanding the "other side".
dashboard.tile_analysis_desc: Know your strengths and weaknesses. The AI will present winning chances and areas requiring special attention.
dashboard.tile_court_desc: Simulate a hearing. Choose a role for the AI and see how you handle the courtroom based on the collected evidence.
dashboard.tile_notes_desc: Save your own thoughts, questions for a lawyer, or important facts. Notes are secure and visible only to you.
dashboard.main_help_desc: The PRO Zone is an advanced process for building your litigation strategy. It consists of 3 steps:
dashboard.main_help_point_1: Upload Documents: Upload everything you have - lawsuits, applications, evidence. It is important to separate your documents (Mine) from the other party's documents (Opposing). This will help us understand both perspectives.
dashboard.main_help_point_2: Strategic Interview: The AI will ask you a series of follow-up questions. Often documents don't say everything - here you can explain the context, your goals, and fears.
dashboard.main_help_point_3: Analysis and Report: Comparison of the process. You will receive a document with a SWOT analysis (strengths/weaknesses), an estimate of the chances of winning, and concrete "step-by-step" recommendations.
dashboard.main_help_footer: Remember: You can return to any step at any time to add new documents or update information.
dashboard.strategy_desc: "The PRO System combines analysis of your documents with an in-depth AI interview. In the end, you will receive a complete litigation strategy that will help you win the case."

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.text: This Privacy Policy describes the rules for processing personal data of users of the AI Legal Assistant application. We care about your privacy and make every effort to ensure your data is secure.

admin.title: 2. Personal Data Administrator
admin.text: The administrator of your personal data is [Your Company Name/Full Name], [Address], [Contact: e-mail address].

scope.title: 3. Scope of Processed Data and Purposes of Processing

login.title: 3.1. Login and Identification Data
login.goalVal: Enabling secure login, account access authorization, user identification in the system.
login.legalVal: Necessity for the performance of a contract for the provision of electronic services (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR).

docs.title: 3.2. Data for Pleadings (Personal Data)
docs.scopeVal: First name, last name, residential address, optionally PESEL or other data required by courts.
docs.goalVal: Automatic generation of official legal documents, lawsuits, and applications at the express request of the user.
docs.infoVal: Providing the PESEL number is optional and depends on the requirements of a specific pleading.

history.title: 3.3. Case History and Conversations (User Content)
history.scopeVal: Content of conversations with the AI Assistant, case descriptions, uploaded files/documents for analysis.
history.goalVal: Ensuring continuity of service (Assistant's "memory"), analysis of the case context to provide accurate legal advice.
history.legalVal: Legitimate interest of the administrator (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).
history.infoVal: The user has the option to delete chat history at any time.

tech.title: 3.4. Technical Data and Preferences
tech.scopeVal: Session information, consent acceptance flags, interface preferences.
tech.goalVal: Maintaining login session, correct page display.

list: Authorized employees and associates of the administrator.
